title: 0sl — Сервис сокращения ссылок. Удобные и быстрые короткие URL
text:
0sl —Сервиссокращенияссылок. УдобныеибыстрыекороткиеURL
[![0SL](https://0sl.io/img/new-logo.png)](https://0sl.io)
# 0sl
СократитьСокращаяссылкуВысоглашаетесьс[правила использования](https://0sl.io/docs/view/privacy)
### КороткийURL дляSMM
Длинныессылкиссоц.сетях выглядятужасно, болеетого, системаможет«обрезать»ипередатьпользователювтакомвиде.
Короткаяссылкатипа0sl.ru/clck - красивовыглядит, легкокопируется, еедажеможнозапомнить. Авыполучитестатистикукаждогоперехода, гдебывынеразместилиссылку.
УпакуйтеввашукороткуюссылкуUTM, pixel идажерефералку, мысократимвсе.
![](https://0sl.io/img/smm-image.png)
### МеньшеURL - легчеQR
РазмерQR напрямуюзависитотдлинныссылки, которуювышифруете. Частовамможетпонадобитьсядобавитькссылкеполныйпутьвместесфильтрамиипараметрами, реферальныйидентификатор, UTM метку, чтосделаетконечныйURL по-настоящему огромным, аQR сложнымдлясчитыванияираспознавания.
Обернитедлиннуюссылкулюбойдлиннывлинктипа0sl.ru/clck иполучитеминималистичныйиудобныйдлячтенияслюбогогаджетаQR.
![](https://0sl.io/img/qr-image.png)
## ЧтотакоеsURL - короткаяссылкаилиукоротительссылокПонятие"sURL" - искусственноеипроисходитотдвухсловshort(с англ. короткий) иURL (с англ. Uniform Resource Locator системаунифицированныхуказателей), аналогомаббревиатурыURL являетсятакжесленговоеслово"линк" либопростослово"ссылка". Вместеданныедвасловаформируюттерминsurl - чтозначитсокращенныйаналогдлинногоURL. Стакойточкизрения, sURL этотерминпризванныйдатькороткоеназваниесжатойссылке, сдругой, этособственноеимянарицательноесервисакороткихссылок. Сегодня0sl.ru призванстатьнепростоукорачивателемссылок, аналогомКликРуилисократителяотGoogle, сегодняэтосервис, гдепользовательможетукоротитьссылкуводинклик, получитьстатистикупосокращеннойссылке, атакжевзятьподполныйконтрольвесьпроцесссокращенияURL. Дляэтогоклиентупредоставляетсядоступличныйкабинетсервиса.
## КороткаяссылкаполезнавомногихслучаяхКороткаяссылкаявляетсяполныманалогомдлинногоURL. ТакимобразомвыможетепередаватьURL любойдлины, например, ссылкинаконкретныйтоварвинтернет-магазине илииспользоватьдополнительныепараметры, например, UTM метку. СжатаяссылкахранитвсебевесьдлинныйлинквместеспараметрамиипростоперенаправляетпользователянаконечныйURL.При этомвыполностьюисключаетерядпроблем:
* Уменьшеннаяссылкабольшенебудетобрезанамессенджеромибудетпереданаадресатувпрямомвиде;
* Ссылкасгенерированнаячерезсокращатель, выглядитодинаковохорошокакврекламномпосте, такивпрезентации;
* КороткуюссылкувыможетеиспользоватьдлягенерацииболеепростыхQR кодов, такиекодысодержатменьшеэлементовилегкосчитываютсяприпечати;
* Сокращеннуюссылкудажепростозапомнить, ведьонахранитвсебевсегонесколькосимволов.
Сегодняуменьшитьсвоюссылкувозможновлюбыхколичествахиабсолютнобесплатно, благодарябыстрымсервисам- сократителям.
## Частыевопросы## Какработаетсократительссылок?
ПослевводаВашегодлинногоадресавампредоставляетсяегосокращенныйаналог. ДаннаяссылканезависимоотместаразмещенияперенаправитпользователянаконечныйURL. Приэтомвысохранитевсепараметры, например, UTM меткиреферальныеметкиипрочее. Каждыйраз, когдаюзерсовершиткликпокороткойссылке, например, 0sl.ru/clck, браузеробратитьсяксерверуиполучит301 ответ. Серверукажетбраузеру, кудастоитперенаправитьпользователяскликапоссылке## Чтопоказываетстатистикакороткойссылки?
Каждаякороткаяссылкаимеетсвоюстатистику, выможетепросмотретьеепростодобавивккороткойссылкезнак"+", например, 0sl.ru/clck+. Встатистикевысможетепосмотретьколичествокликовпокороткойссылке, источникпереходовигеолокациютакихпереходов. Оченьполезнополучитьбыструюинформациюпосжатойссылкебездополнительнойзатратывремени.
## Забылиилипотеряликороткуюссылку?
Этонепроблема, послесокращенияэлектронногоадреса, вашассылкасегократкиманалогомужехранитсявбазе. Такимобразом, чтобыузнатькороткуюссылкудостаточнопростоввестиконечнуюадрес. Еслиссылкабудетсоответствоватьсохраненной, выполучитеужеготовуюсокращеннуюссылку. Вновойсистемепоследовательностисокращенныессылкибудутгенерироватьсярандомно, тоестьнесколькокороткихссылокмогутвестипоодномупрямомуадресусайта.
## Нужноуменьшитьнесколькоссылок?
Вынеограниченывколичествекороткихссылок, которыевыхотитеполучить. Выможетесократитьлюбоеколичестводлинныхссылокпрактическилюбойдлины. НашсервиспоможетуменьшитьотображаемыйURL длявашегосайта, личногосообщенияилиполиграфии.
## Каксократитьссылку?
Длятого, чтобысделатькороткуюссылкуиздлиннойв1 клик, простовставьтеконечныйлинквполеввода. Послечегонажмитекнопку"Сократить". Нашсервиспредоставитсжатыйаналогвашейссылки. Скопируйтеееииспользуйтепоназначению.
## Данныйсокращательаналогдругихсервисов?
Действительносуществуетмножествосервисовуменшеныхссылок, такихкаксокращалкаКликРуилиукоротительgoo.gl отGoogle. Некоторыеизнихужепрекратилисвоюработу(Гугл болеенеподдерживаетсвойсервискороткихURL), другиенедоступнывнекоторыхрегионах. Нашсервисужеболее3-х летгенерируетсжатыессылкиимынепланируемостанавливатьсянадостигнутом.
##### Мыиспользуемфайлыcookie, чтобыобеспечитьваммаксимальноэффективноеиспользованиенашеговеб-сайта, измерятьтрафикипроизводительность, атакжепоказыватьрекламу.
[Подробнее](https://0sl.io/docs/view/cookie)Принять

title: VidyoMobile - Team Collaboration
text:
VidyoMobile is a team collaboration mobile app for iOS and Android. At the heart of the app is the video chat functionality, which provides robust HD video conferencing capabilities, ranging from a two to hundreds of partifipants. During 2016 and 2017 we worked closely with Vidyo Inc. to design and develop this enterprise app as a simple and fully customizable solution for teams.

Our focus in the design of VidyoMobile was to provide rich in-conference user experience and seamless integration with the enterprise environment, including scheduling video chats on your calendar, sending/receiving meeting invitations via email, active directory, chat, screen sharing and more. The combination of all these integrations into a single, simple to use app was critical for reaching the right target audience.

### Video conferencing

Behind the simple user experience hides a very versatile app which integrates seamlessly into your workflow. For example, the app will launch and join a video meeting when you click an invite link in Mail app or Calendar meeting. This works not only from your mobile phone, but also on your desktop and tablet. Joining as a guest does not require any authentication, so guests outside the enterprise can join too.

VidyoMobile also provides authenticated access to team members. Once signed-in, your contacts and calendars are syncted and the app automatically identifies callers, displays calendar meetings and schedules new video meetings into your preferred calendar.

### Multi-screen

VidyoMobile is part of a family of products that live within Vidyo's ecosystem. This ecosystem supports multiple devices - desktops, tablets and mobile phones - and facilitates team collaboration anywhere, any time.

If you're considering adding video chat capabilities to your app or service, check out our [VidyoCore mobile framework](https://vidyocore.100grams.io/), which we created as a follow up to this project. VidyoCore simplifies the integration of Vidyo stack into your mobile app and minimizes the development effort.

### VidyoConnect

In 2017 Vidyo launched [VidyoConnect](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/vidyoconnect/id1103823278?mt=8), the successor of VidyoMobile, which is based on Vidyo Neo. The two apps still live side by side at the time of writing.

text:
[Skip to content](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/full-project-overview/#content)

**[![](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/2map76.jpg)](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/2map76.jpg)**

**2024 CONSTRUCTION BEGINS APRIL 29, 2024.**

- Full closures of WIS 22 at US 45 begins April 29.
- Full closure of WIS 76 between US 45 and WIS 54 begins May 9.

**Project locations**

The WIS 76 improvements are separated into three individual projects that extend from WIS 54 in the village of Shiocton to the US 45/WIS 76/WIS 22 intersection west of the village of Bear Creek in the towns of Bovina, Liberty, Maple Creek and Deer Creek in the counties of Outagamie and Waupaca. Each project is identified by a unique Project​​​ ID.

- **Waupaca County project:** Outagamie/Waupaca County Line to US 45 (Project ID 6518-00-70)
- **Outagamie County project**: WIS 54 to Outagamie/Waupaca County Line (Project ID 6518-06-71)
- **Outagamie County bridge project:** Bridge structures between Boelter​ Road and County W (Project ID 6518-07-71). Complete 2023.
 - WisDOT created a project exhibit showing locations of all three projects on a color-coded display map:
 - [View all project on WIS 76 projects exhibit](https://wisconsindot.gov/Documents/projects/by-region/ne/76shiocton/map2.pdf)

**Project benefits**

The existing pavement is showing signs of distress including traverse cracking and the existing joints are failing. The purpose of the project is to improve the deteriorating pavement and structures on WIS 76, extend the roadway’s service life, decrease maintenance costs, and upgrade other roadway deficiencies to improve safety.   Intersection modifications will provide improved turning movements and increase safety.

**Project improvements** ​​

Project ID 6518-00-70 (Waupaca County: County Line to US 45)

- Mill/overlay of the existing pavement
- Realigning median islands on WIS 76/WIS 22 at US 45 intersection
- Widening for an improved right turn lane on WIS 22 at US 45 intersection
- Pavement markings and shoulder gravel

Project ID 6518-06-71 (Outagamie County: WIS 54 to County Line)

- Mill/overlay of existing pavement
- Culvert replacements (complete 2023)
- Beamguard replacements
- Curb ramp replacements within the village of Bear Creek
- Pavement markings and shoulder gravel

Project ID 6518-07-71 (Outagamie County bridges)

- Replace two existing bridges with box culverts (complete 2023)
- Pavement markings and shoulder gravel (complete 2023)

Please see our project design display showing locations of specific construction operations:

- [View WIS 76 project design display](https://wisconsindot.gov/Documents/projects/by-region/ne/76shiocton/76display.pdf)

**Project schedule**

Construction is scheduled to resume on April 29, 2024 and finish in summer 2024.

**Traffic impacts**

- **Full closure of WIS 22 at US 45 begins April 29, 2024.**
- **Full closure of WIS 76 between US 45 and WIS 54 begins May 9, 2024.**

Full closures, lane closures, and flagging operations will be utilized at various times during construction. Construction will be staged in a manner to minimize traffic disruptions. Access to businesses and property owners will always be maintained.

- Beginning May 6, 2024: WIS 76 will be detoured for the culvert, paving and structure replacement work.
 - The detour will follow WIS 54 and US 45.
 - [View WIS 76 detour route in display map](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/76detour.pdf)

- Beginning April 29, 2024: The west leg of US 45/WIS 76/WIS 22 will be closed for intersection improvements. WIS 22 will be detoured for 45 days.
 - The detour route will utilize County T and County O.
 - [View WIS 22 detour route in display map](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/22detour.pdf)

- Traffic control in the form of flagging operations will be used to close one lane at a time in portions of the work zone.
- Businesses affected by the detours are urged to use the resources noted below for businesses in work zones.

**[![](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/bizpic.jpg)](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/bizpic.jpg) Temporary business signing and business resources**

Temporary business signing may be placed during the detoured portion of the project by filling out a WisDOT business signing permit. All temporary business signing needs approval via the permit before placement to ensure it is in a safe location and does not pose a visual distraction or traffic hazard. The temporary business signing permit is free. Costs associated with creating the temporary sign are the responsibility of the business. The permit is available as a fillable-form WORD document or pdf below, or you can request one from the project contacts below.

- [Download Temporary Business Sign Permit](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/businesssignpermit.docx) (Fillable-form WORD)
- [Download Temporary Business Sign Permit](https://projects.511wi.gov/wis76cirshioc/wp-content/uploads/sites/1025/businesssignpermit.pdf) (PDF)
 - Please email or mail the free permit to any of the contacts below.

For more information regarding temporary signing, plus tips and tools for businesses impacted by highway construction, please visit WisDOT’s “In This Together” business resource website. The In This Together program is offered to business and community leaders as an idea source as they plan for road construction in their area.

- [Visit WisDOT’s In This Together Website](https://wisconsindot.gov/Pages/projects/in-together/default.aspx)

**Project construction contact and field** **office.**

Você pode estabelecer limites diários, semanais ou mensais para seus depósitos no 0066 bet com. Esses limites ajudam a garantir que você não gaste mais do que pode permitir.

Estabeleça um limite máximo de perdas para proteger seu orçamento. Quando esse limite for atingido, o 0066 bet com restringirá temporariamente o acesso aos jogos.

O 0066 bet com monitora constantemente padrões de jogo que podem indicar comportamentos problemáticos. Nosso sistema identifica automaticamente sinais de alerta e pode sugerir pausas ou limitações quando necessário.
Alguns sinais importantes que todos devem conhecer:

* Usar o jogo como escape de problemas pessoais

* Sentir ansiedade ou irritabilidade quando não está jogando

O 0066 bet com tem tolerância zero com jogos por menores de idade. Implementamos verificações rigorosas de idade e sistemas de monitoramento para garantir que apenas adultos tenham acesso ànossa plataforma.

## Highly Demanding **Services**

We specialize in helping businesses optimize their software development process through the implementation of robust CI/CD pipelines.

We offer top-notch DevOps services to help businesses thrive in today's fast-paced digital landscape.

We bring you the cutting-edge capabilities of AWS Connect to revolutionize your customer service operations.

![](https://0scale.io/images/primises-aws.png)[On Premises to AWS](https://0scale.io/onpremisis-aws.php)

We specialize in helping businesses smoothly transition their on-premises infrastructure to the dynamic and scalable environment of AWS (Amazon Web Services).

![](https://0scale.io/images/devops.png)[Containerize Application](https://0scale.io/containerize-application.php)

Containerization is a transformative approach that empowers businesses to build and deliver applications more effectively in today's fast-paced and dynamic technology landscape.

![](https://0scale.io/images/cloud-migration.png)[Cloud Migration](https://0scale.io/cloud-migration.php)

Transfer your applications, database, and servers to the cloud without troublesome consistent operations

## BOOK A **CONSULTANT**

Sure, I can help you with consultancy booking for Cloud Solution, DevOps, and Application Development using .NET and multiple stacks. Here's an overview of the process:

- Initial Consultation: We'll start with an initial consultation to understand your requirements, business objectives, and current technology landscape. This will help us identify the specific areas where you need assistance.
- Needs Assessment: Our team of experts will perform a comprehensive needs assessment, evaluating your existing infrastructure, application architecture, DevOps practices, and any specific challenges you're facing. This assessment will guide the recommendations and solutions we provide.
- Cloud Solution Design: Based on your requirements and objectives, we'll design a customized cloud solution leveraging platforms such as Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), or Google Cloud Platform (GCP). This will include defining the appropriate cloud services, networking, storage, and security architecture to meet your application's needs.
- DevOps Implementation: We'll assist you in implementing a robust DevOps pipeline that integrates with your chosen cloud solution. This will involve setting up continuous integration (CI) and continuous deployment (CD) processes, automating build and release management, and implementing infrastructure as code (IaC) practices.
- Application Development: Our team of skilled developers, proficient in .NET and other stacks, will work closely with you to design and develop your application. We'll follow best practices for software development, ensuring scalability, performance, and maintainability.
- Containerization and Orchestration: If required, we can help containerize your application using technologies like Docker and orchestrate them using platforms like Kubernetes. This will provide portability, scalability, and improved deployment efficiency.
- Monitoring and Optimization: We'll implement robust monitoring and logging solutions, leveraging tools like Azure Monitor, AWS CloudWatch, or similar offerings. This will allow you to gain insights into application performance, resource utilization, and identify areas for optimization.
- Ongoing Support and Maintenance: We provide ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure the smooth operation of your cloud solution, DevOps pipeline, and applications. This includes troubleshooting, performance optimization, and applying necessary updates and patches.

To book a consultancy session, please provide your contact information, preferred date and time, and any specific topics or challenges you would like to discuss. Our team will reach out to you to schedule the consultation and provide further details.
Please note that consultancy services are billed on an hourly or project basis, depending on the scope and duration of the engagement.

## Hire Our **DevOps Experts**

Are you looking to optimize your cloud infrastructure and streamline your development and operations processes? Look no further! Our team of highly skilled DevOps experts specializing in cloud technologies, including Azure, AWS, and GCP, is here to help you achieve your goals.

- Extensive Cloud Expertise: Our DevOps team possesses deep knowledge and hands-on experience with leading cloud platforms such as Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Google Cloud Platform (GCP). They are adept at leveraging the unique features and services offered by each platform to design, build, and manage scalable and resilient cloud infrastructure.
- Cloud Architecture and Design: Our DevOps experts have a strong foundation in cloud architecture and design principles. They will analyze your specific business requirements, assess your existing infrastructure, and design a cloud solution tailored to your needs. Whether it's migrating to the cloud, optimizing your current setup, or architecting a new environment, our team will ensure an efficient and secure cloud infrastructure.
- Continuous Integration and Deployment: We specialize in implementing robust DevOps practices, including continuous integration (CI) and continuous deployment (CD) pipelines. Our DevOps experts will automate your software build, test, and deployment processes, enabling rapid and error-free application releases. They will utilize industry-leading tools like Jenkins, Azure DevOps, AWS CodePipeline, and Google Cloud Build to streamline your development workflow.
- Infrastructure as Code (IaC): Our team embraces Infrastructure as Code (IaC) methodologies to automate the provisioning and management of your cloud infrastructure. With tools like Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates, AWS CloudFormation, and GCP Deployment Manager, our experts will create reusable and version-controlled infrastructure definitions, making deployments consistent, repeatable, and easily scalable.
- Infrastructure as Code (IaC): Our team embraces Infrastructure as Code (IaC) methodologies to automate the provisioning and management of your cloud infrastructure. With tools like Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates, AWS CloudFormation, and GCP Deployment Manager, our experts will create reusable and version-controlled infrastructure definitions, making deployments consistent, repeatable, and easily scalable.
- Cloud Monitoring and Optimization: Monitoring the performance and health of your cloud infrastructure is crucial. Our DevOps team will set up comprehensive monitoring and logging solutions, utilizing Azure Monitor, AWS CloudWatch, GCP Monitoring, and other tools to gain real-time insights into your applications and infrastructure. They will proactively identify bottlenecks, optimize resource utilization, and ensure high availability and scalability.
- Security and Compliance: With a strong focus on security and compliance, our DevOps experts will implement best practices to protect your cloud environment. They will configure robust access controls, implement encryption mechanisms, and perform regular security audits to safeguard your data and applications. Compliance frameworks such as HIPAA, GDPR, and PCI-DSS will be considered to ensure adherence to industry-specific regulations.
- Collaborative and Agile Approach: Our DevOps team believes in collaboration and works seamlessly with your development and operations teams. They follow agile methodologies, fostering open communication, iterative development, and continuous improvement. By aligning with your organization's goals and practices, our experts become an extension of your team, ensuring a smooth and efficient collaboration.

When you hire our DevOps experts, you gain access to a dedicated team with a wealth of cloud knowledge and experience. We offer flexible engagement models tailored to your needs, including project-based assignments, ongoing support, or team augmentation.

Contact us today to discuss your specific requirements, and let our DevOps experts help you unlock the full potential of your cloud infrastructure on Azure, AWS, or GCP. Together, we'll achieve operational excellence, scalability, and cost optimization in the cloud!

## SUCCESS **STORIES**

![](https://0scale.io/images/aws.png)[**Crestic Migrates 5,000 Servers From 10 Data Centers To AWS In Just 8 Months**](https://0scale.io/crestic-case-study.php)

Required to modernize and migrate on AWS. The enormous project involved over 5,000 servers from 10 data centers to AWS in Just 8 Months of timeframe.

![](https://0scale.io/images/aws.png)[**0scale Develops Custom AWS App To Facilitate Protected, Remote File Access**](https://0scale.io/ascd-case-study.php)

ACSD required a way to offer on-site workers protected access to files saved in remote locations.

![](https://0scale.io/images/aws.png)[**ABR Develops Data Architecture Prototypes for potential Data Lake execution**](https://0scale.io/abr-case-study.php)

The ABR wanted to deal with numerous data architecture challenges across its network and build a data lake that incorporated flawlessly with Sales force.

![](https://0scale.io/images/aws.png)[**Amazon Personalize Allows Retailer To Make Commanding Recommendation Engine**](https://0scale.io/flowers-case-study.php)

20Flowers wanted to make a more attractive customer experience by making customized product suggestions via its digital store.

## Frequently Asked **Questions**

#### [How can I get started with AWS Cloud services?](https://0scale.io/\#collapseOne)

Getting started with AWS Cloud services is simple. You can begin by creating an AWS account, which grants you access to a wide range of services. Once your account is set up, you can explore the AWS Management Console, where you can provision and manage various cloud resources. Additionally, AWS provides extensive documentation, tutorials, and online training to help you understand and leverage the full potential of their cloud services.

#### [What are the key benefits of using AWS Cloud services for my business?](https://0scale.io/\#collapseTwo)

AWS Cloud services offer numerous advantages for businesses. Firstly, they provide flexible scalability, allowing you to easily adjust your resources based on demand. This enables cost optimization and prevents overprovisioning. Secondly, AWS offers a robust global infrastructure that ensures high availability and reliability of your applications and data. Additionally, AWS provides a wide range of services, including storage, compute, database, machine learning, and more, allowing you to build and deploy virtually any type of application. Lastly, AWS offers comprehensive security features and compliance certifications to protect your data and ensure regulatory compliance.

#### [How does AWS ensure the security and privacy of my data in the cloud?](https://0scale.io/\#collapseThree)

AWS places a strong emphasis on security and privacy. They employ a multi-layered approach to protect your data. Firstly, AWS infrastructure is built to meet the most stringent security requirements. This includes physical security measures, such as secure data centers, access controls, and surveillance systems. Secondly, AWS provides a wide range of security services and features, such as identity and access management, encryption, network security, and monitoring tools. These enable you to secure your applications and data in the cloud. Additionally, AWS complies with various industry standards and regulations, such as GDPR and HIPAA, and undergoes regular audits to ensure compliance and data privacy.

O conceito por trás do Mines Gold ésimultaneamente simples e fascinante. Você se torna um minerador virtual explorando uma mina repleta de campos ocultos, onde alguns contêm ouro precioso e outros escondem perigos que podem encerrar sua jornada. O objetivo énavegar cuidadosamente pela mina, revelando os tesouros enquanto evita as armadilhas estrategicamente posicionadas.
A mecânica do jogo no 0007 bet app permite que você escolha quantas minas deseja enfrentar em cada rodada, oferecendo controle total sobre o nível de desafio e emoção. Quanto mais minas você adicionar ao campo, maiores serão as recompensas potenciais, mas também aumentará significativamente o risco de encontrar uma armadilha que pode encerrar sua aventura prematuramente.
![0007 bet app](https://0007betapp.net/img/ax32bmzmusn.jpg "0007 bet app")## Estratégias Vencedoras para o Mines Gold
Dominar o Mines Gold requer uma combinação inteligente de estratégia calculada e intuição aguçada. Os jogadores mais experientes da plataforma 0007 bet app desenvolveram técnicas específicas que maximizam as chances de sucesso enquanto minimizam os riscos desnecessários. Uma abordagem popular écomeçar com configurações mais conservadoras para se familiarizar com os padrões do jogo.
A gestão adequada do risco éfundamental para o sucesso no Mines Gold. Muitos jogadores experientes recomendam estabelecer limites claros antes de começar cada sessão, decidindo antecipadamente quando parar para preservar os ganhos ou limitar as perdas. Esta disciplina éessencial para manter uma experiência de jogo saudável e prazerosa no 0007 bet app.
Outro aspecto crucial éobservar cuidadosamente os padrões que emergem durante o jogo. Embora cada rodada seja independente, desenvolver uma compreensão profunda da mecânica do Mines Gold pode ajudar você a tomar decisões mais informadas sobre quando continuar explorando e quando éprudente encerrar uma rodada vitoriosa.
![0007 bet app](https://0007betapp.net/img/zbnx528mf.jpg "0007 bet app")## A Experiência Visual e Sonora do Mines Gold
O 0007 bet app investiu pesadamente na criação de uma experiência audiovisual impressionante para o Mines Gold. Os gráficos detalhados transportam você genuinamente para o interior de uma mina subterrânea, com texturas realistas, iluminação atmosférica e animações suaves que respondem a cada uma de suas ações durante o jogo.
Os efeitos sonoros foram cuidadosamente projetados para intensificar a imersão e a tensão. Desde o som característico de picaretas batendo na rocha até a explosão satisfatória quando você descobre um tesouro, cada elemento auditivo contribui para criar uma atmosfera autêntica de mineração que mantém os jogadores completamente envolvidos na experiência.
A interface do usuário foi otimizada especificamente para proporcionar navegação intuitiva e controles responsivos. Todos os botões e menus são facilmente acessíveis, permitindo que você se concentre completamente na estratégia e na diversão sem se preocupar com dificuldades técnicas ou de usabilidade durante suas sessões no 0007 bet app.
![0007 bet app](https://0007betapp.net/img/sypvtb6n.jpg "0007 bet app")## Por Que o Mines Gold ÉPerfeito para Jogadores Brasileiros
O Mines Gold se tornou rapidamente um dos favoritos entre os usuários brasileiros do 0007 bet app por várias razões específicas. Primeiramente, o jogo oferece uma experiência que combina perfeitamente elementos familiares da cultura brasileira com inovação tecnológica moderna, criando uma atmosfera que ressoa profundamente com nosso público nacional.
A plataforma 0007 bet app garantiu que o Mines Gold funcione perfeitamente com a infraestrutura de internet brasileira, otimizando os tempos de carregamento e minimizando qualquer latência que poderia interferir na experiência de jogo. Esta atenção aos detalhes técnicos específicos do mercado brasileiro demonstra o compromisso da empresa em oferecer qualidade superior para seus usuários.
Além disso, o jogo incorpora elementos visuais e temáticos que fazem referência àrica história de mineração do Brasil, desde o período colonial até os desenvolvimentos modernos. Esta conexão cultural torna o Mines Gold muito mais do que apenas um jogo - éuma experiência que celebra parte importante de nossa herança nacional.
## Tecnologia Avançada e Segurança no Mines Gold
O 0007 bet app emprega tecnologia de última geração para garantir que cada rodada do Mines Gold seja completamente justa e transparente. O sistema utiliza geradores de números aleatórios certificados que passam por auditorias regulares, assegurando que todos os resultados sejam genuinamente imprevisíveis e imparciais.
A segurança dos dados dos jogadores éuma prioridade absoluta durante todas as sessões do Mines Gold. Todas as informações transmitidas são protegidas por criptografia de nível militar, e os servidores do 0007 bet app são monitorados constantemente por especialistas em segurança cibernética para prevenir qualquer tentativa de acesso não autorizado.
O sistema de backup e recuperação garante que seu progresso no Mines Gold nunca seja perdido, mesmo em caso de problemas técnicos inesperados. Esta infraestrutura robusta permite que você jogue com total tranquilidade, sabendo que sua experiência no 0007 bet app está protegida por múltiplas camadas de segurança e redundância.
## Comunidade e Suporte no 0007 Bet App
Uma das características mais valorizadas pelos jogadores do Mines Gold éa comunidade vibrante e acolhedora que se formou ao redor do 0007 bet app. Jogadores experientes frequentemente compartilham dicas, estratégias e experiências que podem ajudar novatos a melhorar rapidamente suas habilidades no jogo.
O suporte técnico especializado está sempre disponível para auxiliar com qualquer dúvida ou problema relacionado ao Mines Gold. A equipe multilíngue, com atendentes fluentes em português brasileiro, garante comunicação clara e resolução rápida de qualquer questão que possa surgir durante sua experiência de jogo no 0007 bet app.
Eventos especiais e torneos temáticos do Mines Gold são organizados regularmente, proporcionando oportunidades adicionais de diversão e competição saudável entre os membros da comunidade. Estas atividades fortalecem os laços entre os jogadores e mantêm o interesse sempre renovado neste fantástico jogo de mineração.

# 双探花齐爆发布朗：我们俩就像冰与火之歌-*编辑：006直播*-2019-12-15浏览量：1,998
![双探花齐爆发 布朗：我们俩就像冰与火之歌](https://006zhibo.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/frc-2a3624edc5059b1731123aff52d29895.jpg)
北京时间12月7日，凯尔特人108-95轻取掘金，迎来三连胜的同时，继续保持本赛季主场不败。
值得一提的是，自波士顿红袜队在当地时间9月28日主场输给巴尔的摩金莺后，波士顿当地的运动队便再也没有遭遇主场落败，凯尔特人今晚的胜利延续了这一纪录。
“这是一座特别的城市，能在这里执教对我来说意味着很多。球队的头号目标一直是能够得到波士顿球迷的喜爱，希望我们已经完成了这个目标。”绿军主帅布拉德-史蒂文斯赛后说道。
此役绿军的双探花均有着出色的发挥：杰伦-布朗首节连续命中三分，最终砍下21分；塔图姆全场三分球8投4中，最终贡献26分。
赛后，杰伦-布朗谈到了他和塔图姆的默契配合：“我们俩性格不同，打法也不太一样，但在场上的连线就像一首冰与火之歌。”
输球的掘金队无缘连胜，约基奇状态回暖砍下30分10篮板，贾马尔-穆雷14投5中得到10分，除他们二人外，掘金无人得分上双。
“我们的防守太差了，这让对手有了太多轻松得分的机会。”约基奇赛后谈到了球队输球的原因。穆雷则认为一场失利说明不了什么：“我们确实打得很糟糕，糟糕透了，但看看战绩，我们仍然在西部前列。所以想象一下，当我们打得好的时候会发生什么吧。”006直播为您提供稳定，领先的即时的NBA和足球直播服务；全面，高清的足球篮球热门赛事视频直播；专业，客观的赛事预测推荐；看NBA免费高清直播，就上006直播网。[\>\>点击观看今日NBA比赛直播](https://www.006zhibo.com)

title: 00-00-0000.org / independent media - média indépendant - medio independiente
text:
00-00-0000.org / independent media - média indépendant - medio independiente
Last Subject / Dernier Sujet : The Bokeo valley is located all along the Mekong River at the crossing point of Thailand, Myanmar (the old Burma), and China. Laos, one of the least developed countries in South-East Asia, is only surviving with an economy essentially based on farming. However, this region is not as poor as the others because of fruitful commercial exchanges. Parallel to its rice production, lumber trade and poppy culture in the Golden Triangle (opium and heroin are derived from poppy flowers), huge gems deposits are laying in this valley whose name means “valley of the sapphires”. This land became a highly coveted one because of sapphires and rubies ..../... La vallée du Bokéo se situe tout au long du Mékong, au carrefour de la Thaïlande, du Myanmar, l’ancienne Birmanie et de la Chine. L'économie laotienne, essentiellement agricole, est une des économies de subsistance la moins développée d'Asie du sud-est. Cependant cette région s’avère plutôt moins pauvre que les autres grâce àses échanges commerciaux conséquents. Parrallèlement àla production de riz, au négoce du bois et àla culture du pavot dans le Triangle d’Or (à partir duquel est produit l’opium et l’héroïne), il existe d'importants gisements de pierres précieuses dans cette vallée dont le nom signifie “vallée des saphirs”. Les saphirs et les rubis en particulier, assurent àcette région un statut de territoire convoité...

Statement / propos :
Statement /
00-00-0000 originated with the idea of recording, in a very personal way, the events I am experiencing and that are touching me, with the hope to be able to share these instants with you…
This work renews the long relationship that art has with current events, from Jan van Eyck to Velasquez, without forgetting Frans Hals, from 20th century French Realism to David’s, Delacroix’s and Géricault’s historical paintings… This work belongs to the visual artists’ tradition: that is to use daily events as topics… as models… These themes are not only “news scoops” but also a series of minor points, trivial events that are my own scoops, my own news… But it sometimes happens that “my news” meet with media news… The frequency, the subjects and the topics are diverse… I allow myself freedom, as much from their viewpoint as their content. To me, these moments always are touching, furtive, and fleeting, so my camera eye and these words are attempting to tell them to you, to fixate them, and to recreate them.
These mediatic works are a point of view, an artistic claiming, and an individualistic glance, gentle to the community and to the whole society. They are confronting the stillness of the image to movements, instants to eternity, distance to action.
There is no truth here, but only a visual and a resonant partisan communication…
Propos /
00-00-0000 est né de l'envie de rendre compte, de manière personnelle, des événements que je rencontre et qui me touchent afin de partager avec vous ces instants…
Ce travail renoue ainsi avec la longue relation que l'art entretient avec l'actualité, de Jan Van Eyck à Vélasquez ou encore à Frans Hals, du réalisme français de Courbet du XIXe siècle, à la peinture de l’Histoire de David, Delacroix ou Géricault… Ce travail s’inscrit donc dans la tradition des artistes visuels : utiliser l'actualité comme matière… Comme modèle...
Ces sujets ne sont pas exclusivement la « Une » de nos quotidiens, mais plutôt une suite d'événements mineurs, de faits-divers qui représentent ma « Une », mon actualité... Cependant, il arrive parfois que celle-ci croise l'actualité médiatique... La fréquence, le contenu et les thématiques sont variés... Je m'accorde toute liberté, tant du point de vue de leur traitement, que de leur sujet. Ces moments sont toujours, à mes yeux, des moments attachants, furtifs et fugaces que l’œil de ma caméra et que cette mise en ligne tente de vous conter, de fixer ou de recréer.
Ces œuvres médiatiques sont un point de vue, une revendication artistique, un regard individualiste, attentif à la collectivité et à l’espace sociétal. Elles confrontent la fixité de l’image aux mouvements, l’instant à l’éternité, la distance à l’action.
Ici, pas de vérité, juste une communication partisane visuelle et sonore…
Xavier Cahen
|
|

author: Xavier Cahen

title: 歯医者さんで使っている「水の仕組み」ってどうなっているの（医院で使う水の現状）
text:
歯医者さんで使っている「水の仕組み」ってどうなっているの（医院で使う水の現状） | 歯医者さんの水は大丈夫？水のきれいな歯医者さん# [![歯医者さんの水は大丈夫？水のきれいな歯医者さん。歯科の体験口コミもあり](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/poic_logo_pc.png)](https://0-haisha.com/)
[![運営:特定非営利活動法人POIC&®研究会事務局](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/poic_header_logo_pc.gif)](http://www.poic.org/)
[![Page Top](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/back_bt.png)](#)
[ホーム](https://0-haisha.com) : 歯医者さんで使っている「水の仕組み」ってどうなっているの（医院で使う水の現状）# 歯医者さんで使っている「水の仕組み」ってどうなっているの（医院で使う水の現状）![歯医者さんで使っている「水の仕組み」ってどうなっているの（歯科ユニットの現状）](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_main_pc.gif)
![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
小梅ちゃんは、歯医者さんで虫歯の治療したことある？![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
あるある！あのキュイーンって音、とっても苦手です・・。![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
そのキュイーンって音のする機械を「タービン」と言うんだ1秒どれくらいの回転数か、知っている？
![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
う～ん、一秒間に・・・100回くらい？
![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
なんと、一秒間に5000～8000回転も回っているんだ！
![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
え～～！早っ！![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
歯の一番外側は「エナメル質」といって体の中で一番硬い組織だから、そこを削るための「タービン」の削る部分は硬い「ダイヤモンド」で出来ている。「硬いもの」が「超高速」で回ったら「摩擦熱」が起きるよね。なので、「摩擦熱」を冷やすため「水」が一緒に出ているんだ。![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
そういえば、焦げたようなにおいが口の中でするかも・・。そして、お水が一緒にピューって出ている気がする・・・。![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
そのタービンには構造上、「水」が止まる瞬間に水が垂れないように少し水を吸い込む機能があるんだ。[（参照：2歯医者さんの水はこんなに危険！？）](https://0-haisha.com/water2)
この水の中や機械の中に残った水の中に、病原菌が含まれていると、その中でばいきんが増えて「バイオフィルム」を作ってしまうことがあるんだ。![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
「バイオフィルム」って・・・何ですか？？![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
台所の排水溝って掃除しないとヌメヌメしてくるでしょう？あれが「バイオフィルム」。ばいきん同士がタッグを組んじゃっているので、簡単には汚れが落ちない。さらには、水を供給する配管は、夜は水を使わないから流れないよね。水の流れが止まると、どうしてもばいきんが増えてしまう。という良くない連鎖・スパイラルが、タービンだけでなく、歯医者さんで使う水の他の部分でも起きてしまっているのが現実なんだ。ちなみに、タービンの水は直径1.25ｍｍのチューブを逆流して、長さ約12ｍのチューブの中を行き来している。
![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
・・・・本当ですか？？![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
残念ながら本当なんだ。2015年8月27日の読売新聞夕刊にも、その話は載っていたんだよ。
![読売新聞夕刊](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/sinbun.jpg)
引用元(2015/8/27読売新聞夕刊)
![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
そもそも病院や店舗など水を扱う施設には『水道法』という法律で、施設内の水の中に「含まれる残留塩素量」や「細菌の数」が規定されているよ。厚生労働省は下記の「水道法の水質基準を満たすことが大事」と言っている。![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
「水道法」っていう法律があるんですね？### ■水道法施行規則（昭和３２年１２月１４日厚生省令第４５号）（抜粋）（衛生上必要な措置）三給水栓における水が、遊離残留塩素を０．１mg／l（結合残留塩素の場合は、０．４mg／l）以上保持するように塩素消毒をすること。ただし、供給する水が病原生物に著しく汚染されるおそれがある場合又は病原生物に汚染されたことを疑わせるような生物若しくは物質を多量に含むおそれがある場合の給水栓における水の遊離残留塩素は、０．２mg／l（結合残留塩素の場合は、１．５mg／l）以上とする。
※厚生労働省ホームページ「水道法第４条及び第２２条等の関係について」[http://www.mhlw.go.jp/shingi/2002/10/s1007-5c.html](http://www.mhlw.go.jp/shingi/2002/10/s1007-5c.html)
### ■微生物に係る基準について2.3 「一般細菌」について水道の分野における微生物汚染への対応はRobert Kochの業績に始まり、緩速砂ろ過により細菌聚落数（現在の一般細菌に相当）が 100個/ml 以下に制御（ろ過除去）された水道水を介してコレラやチフスが発生していないことを根拠として、細菌数の測定をろ過工程評価に採用したことである。わが国においてもこの目的で一般細菌が導入された。※厚生労働省ホームページ「微生物に係る基準について」[http://www.mhlw.go.jp/shingi/2003/02/s0203-3a.html](http://www.mhlw.go.jp/shingi/2003/02/s0203-3a.html)
![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
上の資料のように「水道法」に「水質基準」というのがあって、「1ｍｌあたりの細菌数は１００個以下」と決められているんだ。
ところが、ある歯医者さんの水を調査したら「1ｍｌあたり1,500,000個」もの細菌が存在していたというデータがあるんだ。
＜2008年12月　日本歯科医師会雑誌より　大阪大学レポート＞
![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
・・・・・。![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
あと、タービン以外に、歯医者さんではどこで水を使うかわかる？![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
・・・口をゆすぐ時に使うかも。![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
そうだね。あと、歯石をとる道具「スケーラー」、治療した患部に水をかけてきれいにする、更には治療で使った器具を洗う時にも水を使うんだ。とにかく、歯医者さんはイッパイ水を使う。その水がきれいか汚いかわからない歯医者さんで治療するより、きれいな歯医者さんで治療した方がいいよね。![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
もちろんです！![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
そうだね。ちなみに、さっきの新聞記事について、こんなアンケート結果もあるよ。【アンケート結果】Q1今回の読売新聞の報道記事について、以前からご存知でしたか？
![アンケート結果](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_graf01.gif)![](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/koume_komatta.png)
Q2今回の読売新聞の報道記事内容について知った上で（知っていた上で）これからの歯科医院への受診姿勢はどう変わりますか？
![アンケート結果](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_graf02.gif)
![アンケート結果](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_graf03.gif)
![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
私も「怖い」に一票。![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
また、そのアンケートには、下記のような意見も寄せられているよ。Q3今回の読売新聞の報道記事について、その他ご意見をご自由に、お書き下さい。 
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso01.gif)
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso02.gif)
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso03.gif)
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso04.gif)
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso05.gif)
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso06.gif)
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso07.gif)
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso08.gif)
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso09.gif)
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso10.gif)
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso11.gif)
![感想](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/page3_kanso12.gif)
![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
もっともな感想ばかりですね。一体どうしたらいいんだか、わからなくなってきちゃった・・。![バリーさん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/bary01.png)
そうだね。でも「きれいな水で治療しよう！！」とがんばっている歯医者さんたちがいるんだ！今度はそのきれいな水で治療してもらえる歯医者さんが、一体どんな仕組みを使っているのかを見てみよう。![小梅ちゃん](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/koume01.png)
はい！[![水を綺麗にする仕組みって？](https://0-haisha.com/wp-content/themes/poic/images/index-banner03.gif)](https://0-haisha.com/water4)

This includes real property maintenance, customer service, military family housing maintenance (MFHM), grounds maintenance and computer support. We also provide all necessary supervision, personnel, supplies and equipment required to perform all of the MFHM services on base for 645 homes at LA Air Force Base and Fort MacArthur, including single-family homes, unattached quarters and dormitories. AbilityOne Services at Los Angeles Air Force Base include: - Self-help store management and staffing - Inventory Management: consumable, non-consumable, appliances, parts, tools and government and/or contractor furnished equipment - Change of Occupancy Maintenance - Quality Control, Maintenance Management - Service Call System, Recurring Inspections - Appliance Repair, Replacement and Storage - Locksmith and Key Control Services - Exterior and Interior Walls - Flooring: Repair and Replace - Exterior Fixtures or Structures: Repair and Replace - Off-base housing referral, relocation service, furnishings management and dormitory services - Housing Management: occupancy, assignment, and termination of military family housing (MFH), leased housing, unaccompanied housing and general officer quarters (GOQ) Base Operation and Support: - Storm water systems including risers, inlets, catch basins, sump pumps, surge tank, perforated sub-drains, oil/water separators and piping - Diesel generators, gas generators, automatic transfer panels and all associated mechanical/electrical systems - Water distribution systems including distribution mains, arterial mains, water treatment equipment, water storage tanks, all associated controls, water lines, valves, underground irrigation systems, non-potable/reuse systems, underground and above ground fire suppression system - Meter reading as required - Sanitary sewer system including sanitary sewer lines, lift stations, main connections, septic tank systems, oil/water separators, and grease traps - Natural and compressed gas systems including piping, valves, regulators, meters, and pressure vessels - Overhead and underground electrical distribution systems, substations, switching stations, electrical vaults, exterior lights, meters, low voltage electrical wiring, devices, electrical equipment, lightning protection, seasonal decorative lighting, all building interior electrical and lighting systems and grounding systems | ![](https://www.abilityone.gov/images/spacer.gif) | | ![](https://www.abilityone.gov/images/spacer.gif) | | | | |

title: Funderingsproblemen
text:
Funderingsproblemen - Fundering
# Funderingsproblemen
## Snel naar:
* **[Wat is een funderingsprobleem?](#d3)
* **[Hoe herken ik een funderingsprobleem?](#d4)
* **[Wat zijn de oorzaken van funderingsproblemen?](#d5)
* **[Tot wanneer werden er houten paalfunderingen gebruikt?](#d6)
* **[Mijn buren hebben funderingsproblemen. Wat betekent dat voor mij?](#d7)
* **[Ik heb recent een woning gekocht. Nu blijkt dat er (mogelijk) funderingsproblemen zijn. Wat kan ik doen?](#d8)
## Interactieve video:
[![](http://fundering.0to9.io/assets/img/playvideo.png)](https://projects.ivorystudio.net/embed/projects/DxD-18Aj-deL?iv_start=51030)
In deze interactieve video wordt uitgelegd welke soorten fundering er zijn. Ook is te zien wat de oorzaken zijn van problemen. Neem snel een kijkje.
## Hoe weet ik of mijn woning risico loopt op funderingsproblemen?
### Doe de snelle funderingscheck.
Heeft u een woning in Rotterdam? Of bent u op zoek naar een woning? Dan is het interessant om te weten welk type fundering eronder zit. Houten paalfunderingen kunnen namelijk in kwaliteit achteruitgaan, waardoor er schade kan ontstaan.
Benieuwd of het slim is om onderzoek te doen naar uw fundering? Doe de snelle funderingscheck:
* Vul dan uw postcode in
* Zie direct een uitslag[Doe de funderingscheck](http://fundering.0to9.io/)
### Zoek uw woning op de Rotterdamse funderingskaart.
•• Op de risicokaart kunt u zien of er funderingsproblemen bekend zijn in uw buurt.
•• Op de funderingstypekaart kunt u zien of er iets bekend is over de fundering van uw woning.Als u op het gezochte pand een groen vierkantje ziet staan dan is het funderingstype vastgesteld op basis van funderingsonderzoek. U kunt het onderzoek daar gelijk downloaden.
[Bekijk de funderingskaart](http://fundering.0to9.io/funderingskaart/)
## Wat is een funderingsprobleem?
De fundering is de constructie die een pand draagt. Bij panden die na 1980 gebouwd zijn, werden betonnen palen gebruikt en die geven zelden problemen. Voor die tijd werden er vaak houten paalfunderingen gebruikt en die kunnen na verloop van tijd slechter worden. Omdat de fundering in de grond onder de woning is aangebracht, is deze vrijwel nooit zichtbaar. Veel woningeigenaren weten daarom niet welke fundering er onder hun woning zit en in welke staat deze verkeert. Het is belangrijk om dit te weten, want als een fundering het pand niet meer kan dragen, kan dat op termijn veel schade veroorzaken. In het ergste geval kan er zelfs sprake zijn van instortingsgevaar.
[Doe de funderingscheck](http://fundering.0to9.io/funderingsonderzoek/)![icoon van een onderzeeboot](http://fundering.0to9.io/assets/img/sub.png)
## Hoe herken ik een funderingsprobleem?
Situaties die erop kunnen wijzen dat er mogelijk funderingsproblemen zijn:
* Klemmende ramen en/of deuren
* Schuin aflopende vloeren
* Scheuren in de gevel, draagmuren en/of tussenmuren
* Scheefstand en/of verzakkingen
* Lekkende goot tussen panden
* Signalen uit de omgeving
Funderingsproblemen zijn niet altijd zichtbaar.
## Wat zijn de oorzaken van funderingsproblemen?
Funderingsproblemen worden vaak veroorzaakt door een combinatie van de onderstaande factoren:
* Aantasting van funderingshout door schimmels (paalrot)
* Aantasting van funderingshout door bacteriën (palenpest)
* Negatieve kleef (wanneer grond aan de palen hecht en de palen naar beneden trekt)
* Constructiefouten, bijvoorbeeld onvoldoende palen
Door funderingsonderzoek kan worden onderzocht wat de staat van de fundering is. Maar ook wat de oorzaak is van aanwezige funderingsproblemen en welke maatregelen u kunt nemen om meer schade te voorkomen.
[Waterloket](https://www.rotterdam.nl/wonen-leven/waterloket/)Vragen over (grond)water? Op het Waterloket vindt u allerlei informatie over water in Rotterdam.
## Tot wanneer werden er houten paalfunderingen gebruikt?
Woningen die gebouwd zijn na 1980 hebben vrijwel allemaal een fundering van beton. Maar voor die tijd werden er vooral houten palen gebruikt. Naar schatting hebben 120.000 huishoudens in Rotterdam een houten paalfundering. Een houten paalfundering kan worden aangetast door meerdere oorzaken. Bijvoorbeeld door schimmels (paalrot), bacteriëën, (palenpest), te weinig of te korte palen of door negatieve kleef (wanneer grond aan de palen hecht en de palen naar beneden trekt). Om ernstige schade te voorkomen is het belangrijk te weten wat de staat van uw houten paalfundering is. De gemeente Rotterdam nodigt u daaromuit om in uw fundering te duiken. Klik op de button om gelijk offertes aan te vragen bij erkende bureaus voor funderingsonderzoek.
Het kan ook zijn dat uw woning gebouwd is op een ondiepe fundering. Die woningen zakken mee met de ondergrond en kunnen op termijn wateroverlast krijgen. Meer weten over het typefundering onder uw eigen woning? Kijk op de funderingskaart op de homepage van deze website en zoek op adres.
### Funderingsonderzoek nodig?
[Vraag offerte aan](http://fundering.0to9.io/funderingsonderzoek/offerte-aanvragen/)
![icoon van een onderzeeboot](http://fundering.0to9.io/assets/img/sub.png)![icoon van een periscoop](http://fundering.0to9.io/assets/img/periscoop.png)
## Mijn buren hebben funderingsproblemen. Wat betekent dat voor mij?
Als uw buren funderingsproblemen hebben is de kans aanwezig dat dat ook voor u opgaat. Zeker als u de fundering deelt met uw buren (mandeligheid). Daarom is het belangrijk om gezamenlijk funderingsonderzoek uit te voeren.
## ## Ik heb recent een woning gekocht. Nu blijkt dat er (mogelijk) funderingsproblemen zijn. Wat kan ik doen?
De koper mag ervan uitgaan dat de woning geschikt is voor normaal gebruik. Als een woning eigenschappen heeft die normaal gebruik in de weg staan, dan kan er sprake zijn van non-conformiteit. Dit kan het geval zijn bij een gebrekkige fundering.Als een ingrijpend funderingsherstel noodzakelijk is, wordt niet aan dat vereiste voldaan en zou eventuele schade op de verkoper kunnen worden verhaald. Win tijdig juridisch advies in over uw eigen situatie.
## Meer over funderingen
[![](http://fundering.0to9.io/images/uploads/duikinjefundering.jpg)
Funderingsonderzoek
](http://fundering.0to9.io/funderingsonderzoek)[![](http://fundering.0to9.io/images/uploads/PHOTO-2021-01-27-10-11-293.jpg)
Funderingsherstel
](http://fundering.0to9.io/funderingsherstel)[![](http://fundering.0to9.io/images/uploads/METING_ert.jpg)
Projecten
](http://fundering.0to9.io/projecten)
## Duik in je fundering
* [Cookies](https://www.rotterdam.nl/cookies/)
* [Proclaimer](https://www.rotterdam.nl/bestuur-organisatie/proclaimer/)
* [Uw gegevens](https://www.rotterdam.nl/bestuur-organisatie/uw-gegevens/)
* [Disclaimer](http://fundering.0to9.io/disclaimer/)
* [Toegankelijkheid](https://www.rotterdam.nl/bestuur-organisatie/toegankelijkheid/)
* [Contact](http://fundering.0to9.io/contact/)
![Logo van Gemeente Rotterdam](http://fundering.0to9.io/assets/img/Gemeente%20Rotterdam_Beeldmerk_RGB_Wit_2021.png)

title: yourwebsite.com
text:
Parking Page
# yourwebsite.com
Registered at
## Is this your domain?
Get it online with cloud-based Shared Hosting, complete with high-performance servers, scalable plans, and free SSL.
See hosting plans
### Want a similar domain for your brand?
Find similar domains
## Tools to start a website
Domains
### Discover similar domains
Find the perfect name for your website.
Start searching
Shared Hosting
### Create your website
Launch your domain with speedy, secure, and stable hosting.
Learn more
Spacemail
### Communicate securely
Encrypted branded email.
Explore Spacemail
## Frequently asked questions
### What is Spaceship?
It's a digital platform that makes launching your online vision simple. Here, you can get all the tools you need to build your online presence, from domain names and shared hosting to encrypted email. Every website you create with us is automatically secured with domain privacy and a free SSL for 1 year.
### How do I choose the right domain name?
A good domain name is short and memorable and ideally under 8 characters. A domain name is your online identity, so it’s important that it accurately represents your brand. That means picking both the right domain and domain extension (TLD). The most popular, classic TLDs include .com, .org, and .net. TLDs like .co, and .xyz are common within domain, crypto, and tech communities, while .ai has been rising in popularity in recent times.
### How do I create a website?
Every great website name starts with a domain name. Once you pick the right name, choose from one of our Shared Hosting plans to get it online. Then it’s time to start designing your website.
### Do I need developers to start a website?
Not at all. These days anyone can create a sleek website without the help of professionals. There are multiple content management systems available online that simplify the process with thousands of templates and plugins. WordPress is one of the most popular options, which you can install easily on Spaceship Hosting Manager.
### How do I make my website available to visitors?
Unlike other web hosts that require users to point their domain to hosting via DNS records, Spaceship takes care of all that for you. Your domain and hosting plan will connect automatically during unboxing, so you don’t need to think about a thing.
### What is Unboxing?
Unboxing is a simple way for you to connect your Spaceship products. You simply choose what you want to connect, and we do the rest.
### What is encrypted email?
Whether you use your email for personal or business needs, encryption will protect you from data theft. Encrypted email cannot be hacked or read by unknown parties.
Still have questions? Talk to us in live chat

title: 75th Anniversary
text:
At a special election held on December 14, 1948, the voters of Contra Costa County approved the formation of a junior college district by a vote of 6,062 to 5,288. Following the vote of the people, the Board of Supervisors officially declares the formation of the Contra Costa County Junior College District (CCCJCD) at their December 27, 1948, meeting. Thus began the 75-year history of the institution’s mission to serve high quality and affordable higher education in its community.

Thanks to the GI Bill and the influx of military and war workers who moved to California during World War II, the establishment of junior colleges offered the affordable higher education solution needed to successfully return to civilian life. The CCCJCD was one of 14 college districts formed between 1946 and 1950 and became the first countywide community college district in the state.

The first classrooms of the CCCJCD were set up at Camp Stoneman in Pittsburg in 1949, and later that year the first campus was established at the Kaiser Shipyard in Richmond, affectionately known as “Shipyard Tech.” The auspicious beginning eventually led to the construction of Contra Costa College in San Pablo. At the time, Contra Costa County’s population was 249,322 and was growing quickly, so in 1950 a second campus was established in Martinez, which eventually was relocated and became Diablo Valley College in Pleasant Hill. As the county continued to grow eastward and southward, a third campus was built at the former Camp Stoneman in Pittsburg that eventually became Los Medanos College. Smaller academic centers were established in Brentwood in 2001, and in San Ramon in 2006, providing a higher education opportunity to anyone in the County within a 15-minute drive.

In November 1971, the CCCJCD was renamed the Contra Costa Community College District (4CD), and today it serves approximately 46,000 unduplicated students annually (2022-23). The diversity of the current students served is reflective of the changing demographics of the County, where a majority of the students are students of color. 4CD employs almost 3,600 full and part-time employees and is one of the largest employers in the County and a major contributor to the local economy.

title: Logout - 01Cloud
text:
01Cloud Logout - 01Cloud https://dev-docs.01cloud.io/cli/auth/logout
Logout - 01Cloud
01Cloud
2023-01-01T00:00:00Z
# logout
zocli auth logout
command removes the authentication configuration from the device,
and also invalidates the session for the token (BY DEFAULT).
If you want to logout but not to invalidate the session from the server then you can
use `-d` flag as,
zocli auth logout -d
This will remove the authentication from the device only.
After successfull **logout**, **zocli** will print below statement on the console.
✓ Successfully Logged out.
Back to top

Section 508 is a federal law that requires agencies to provide individuals with disabilities access to electronic and information technology and data comparable to those who do not have disabilities, unless an undue burden would be imposed on the agency. The Section 508 standards are the technical requirements and criteria that are used to measure conformance with the law. More information on Section 508 and the technical standards can be found at [www.section508.gov](https://www.section508.gov/). Our website content is provided primarily in HTML format. Accessible PDF (Portable Document Format) versions are available for most of our longer documents. One popular viewer for PDF files is Acrobat Reader. No endorsement is implied. Please contact our Section 508 coordinator, Edward Yang, at [eyang@abilityone.gov](mailto:eyang@abilityone.gov), or call 703-603-2100, if you: - Have feedback or concerns related to the accessibility of any content on this website - Have ideas or comments that would help us improve the accessibility and usability of our website - Would like to file a Section 508 related complaint If applicable, please include the webpage URL and the specific problems you have encountered. Letters should be addressed to: Edward Yang 508 Coordinator U.S. AbilityOne Commission 355 E Street SW, Suite 325 Washington, DC 20024 ## Related policies and procedures Information about our reasonable accommodations policies and procedures, the Architectural Barriers Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. §§ 4151-57), and more can be found on our [Equal Employment Opportunity page](https://www.abilityone.gov/commission/eeo.html). | ![](https://www.abilityone.gov/images/spacer.gif) | | ![](https://www.abilityone.gov/images/spacer.gif) | | | | |

# 余江眼镜：百年产业展新姿今年4月，余江县发布““全球征集令””：悬赏300万元，面向全球““借智””征集眼镜特色小镇规划设计方案。不久前，我省公布首批44个特色小镇创建名单，余江县中童““眼镜小镇””名列其中，余江县将投入20亿元打造，让特色小镇承载着余江眼镜这个百年产业创新发展的大战略。
“一副担子满天飞，走遍南北走东西。”余江眼镜产业是我省的传统特色产业之一。早在200多年前的清朝嘉庆年间，余江县中童镇就出现了眼镜加工作坊和眼镜商帮组织。改革开放后，余江人用一根扁担挑出了一个眼镜大产业：全县在外从事眼镜销售的队伍多达5万余人，足迹遍布全国各地以及60多个国家和地区，国内零售门店逾万家，国外贸易网点300多个，辐射2000多个城市，销售额达170多亿元。早在上世纪90年代初，鹰潭眼镜市场就已成为全国四大眼镜市场之一。
余江眼镜既是传统产业，也是朝阳产业。近年来，余江县以销售优势拉动制造业发展，眼镜产业形成产销良性互动、生产和贸易双轮驱动的良好发展态势，余江也成为国内眼镜产业的新地标，国内老视镜领军品牌厦门夕阳红公司及高端太阳镜OEM生产项目、晴美光学隐形眼镜等10多个知名眼镜企业落户园区。创业精英也纷纷凤还巢：余江外贸眼镜第一人汪君荣，2010年回到故乡投资10亿元建设鹰潭国际眼镜城；中国隐形眼镜销售“巨头”周光美回乡办起了企业；江西省眼镜商会会长朱新财返乡从事眼镜批发……2016年，鹰潭（余江）眼镜产业园实现主营业务收入97亿余元，成为集原材料、配件、镜片、电镀、成品眼镜以及设备制造等行业紧密协作配套的特色产业集群。
这个扁担挑出来的大产业如今正在发生大变革。去年鹰潭（余江）眼镜产业园成功创建国家4A级旅游景区，这里不再是单一的工业生产基地，而是集眼镜文化旅游、眼镜文化展示、眼镜产品交易、眼镜休闲体验、电子商务、科普教育、餐饮、娱乐为一体的最具创意的园林景观式眼镜文化主题景区，2016年接待游客6万人次，今年游客接待量将达到10万人次。余江县有关负责人表示：已经启动世界眼镜博物馆二期建设，建设青少年眼视光科普基地，完善和提升博物馆展览展示功能，打造成为国家级大型综合性眼镜文化博物馆，以此强化鹰潭眼镜产业在同业中的地位，提升余江乃至鹰潭的知名度和城市文化品位。

title: 10coins - New generation crypto payment gateway
text:
10coins - New generation crypto payment gateway
[10coins](https://10coins.io/)
[Get Started](https://10coins.io/contact/)
# Products
360 solution offering great UX, unique features and full back
end-control.
[Get Started](https://10coins.io/contact/)
## Risk
management system
Built-in Risk management tool and set of alerts which will allow you identify risky transactions and set automatic actions within the platform
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)
## Invoicing
Built-in invoicing system which presents all deposits and payouts with all their details in order to provide your end users all the information they on their transactions.
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)
## Over/Under payments Acceptance system
Built-in predefined mechanism which will allow you to determine which transactions to accept in case a different amount was transferred by end users than what was originally planned.
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)
## Localization
English, Japanese, Chinese, etc.
Fully localized deposit with 20 languages, ability to customize the deposit pages flexibly to create unique user flow.
[Get Started](https://10coins.io/contact/)
![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)
